name: Agile CRM Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Agile CRM Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Agile CRM API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Agile CRM API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new deal
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many deals

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: Unique identifier for a particular contact
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular contact | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20

filterType.name: filterType
filterType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter | 默认值: none

matchType.name: matchType
matchType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Must Match | 默认值: anyFilter

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: False

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

jsonNotice.displayName: See Agile CRM guide to creating filters
jsonNotice.name: jsonNotice
jsonNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: See Agile CRM guide to creating filters

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

additionalFieldsJson.name: additionalFieldsJson
additionalFieldsJson.description: Object of values to set as described here
additionalFieldsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 作用: Object of values to set as described here

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: expectedValue (值: None) - Expected Value of deal
probability (值: None) - Expected Value of deal

companyId.name: companyId
companyId.description: Unique identifier for a particular company
companyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular company | (必填项)

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal ID | 作用: ID of deal to update | (必填项)

closeDate.name: closeDate
closeDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Close Date | 作用: Closing date of deal | (必填项)

expectedValue.name: expectedValue
expectedValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Expected Value | 作用: Expected Value of deal | 默认值: 1 | (必填项)

milestone.name: milestone
milestone.natural_language_description: 参数名: Milestone | 作用: Milestone of deal | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of deal | (必填项)

probability.name: probability
probability.natural_language_description: 参数名: Probability | 作用: Expected probability | 默认值: 50 | (必填项)
